$the hard grounder caromed off pitcher Jonathan Sanchez towards second baseman Freddy Sanchez; as Sanchez ran in to field the ball on the grass, Scott Hairston, running from 1B to 2B, did not know how to get around Sanchez; Hairston ran in front of the fielder, impeding his path to the ball; Hairston was called out for interferering with Sanchez, thus ending the inning and preventing a run from scoring; Padres manager Bud Black argued the call with the umpires and protested the game
